Resolved Question Show me another » Where can u work at 15? Not like paper route or dog walking like a real place.? I live in Canada and i just got turned down at my dream job cuz i'm 15 not 16.. any ideas? 8 months ago Report Abuse by »-PσPтαя... Member since: September 27, 2008 Total points: 1,669 (Level 3) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Voters I think dq starts at 15, but qo on snag a job&click teen jobs&see kus it worked for me 8 months ago Report Abuse 100% 2 Votes Action Bar: 0 stars - mark this as Interesting! Email Comment ( 0 ) Save Add to My Yahoo! Add to Del.icio.us RSS

Other Answers (1)
by Sarah Elizabeth Member since: March 15, 2011 Total points: 1,204 (Level 3) Add Contact Block Maybe you could work as a bagger at Kroger...? Or a cashier at a fast food restaurant..? If there are any cafe's near you that are owned by just a normal person, not a food chain, you might be able to be a waitress there. Good luck! 8 months ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes
